---
title: "Run elixir in R Markdown"
---


```{r}
library(elixir4r)
```



```{elixir}
{{year, month, day}, {hour, _, _}} = :calendar.local_time()
IO.puts("hello world from #{year}/#{month}/#{day} #{hour} o'clock") 
```


```{elixir, eval = FALSE}
# skip evaluation 
IO.puts("I am not evaluated.")
```
